qa_issues.description: The statement 'deep learning is a very powerful approach in machine learning' is vague and lacks specific context regarding its strengths or applications.
qa_issues.suggested_fix: Specify what makes deep learning powerful compared to other approaches.

new_lines: Deep learning is a very powerful approach in machine learning due to its ability to model complex patterns in large datasets and its success in applications such as image and speech recognition. Many people find it confusing and difficult to understand, especially when they first encounter it.
